# metabOmics

Lightweight tools and pipelines for metabolomics and metabolic network analysis.

## Install

From PyPI :

```powershell
pip install metabOmics
```

## Quick usage

```python
import metabOmics

# print package version
print(metabOmics.__version__)

# Example: run a main script from the repository
# python -m metabOmics.main_metabolomics_pipeline
```
